title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry pancetta until crispy.
Mix eggs and parmesan together in a bowl.
Combine spaghetti, pancetta, and egg mixture off the heat.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and tikka masala spice for at least 2 hours.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken until cooked.
Sauté onions, add tomato puree and cream, and simmer.
Add chicken to the sauce and cook for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: Tender strips of beef cooked in a creamy mushroom sauce served over noodles or rice.
instructions: Sauté onions and mushrooms in butter until soft.
Add beef strips and cook until browned.
Sprinkle flour and stir to thicken.
Add sour cream and simmer for 5-7 minutes.
Serve over noodles or rice.

title: Greek Salad
summary: A refreshing mix of tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, feta cheese, and red onions.
instructions: Chop tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion.
Mix vegetables with olives in a bowl.
Crumble feta cheese on top.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle oregano.
Toss gently and serve.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: Colorful vegetables sautéed with soy sauce, garlic, and ginger.
instructions: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté garlic and ginger.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.
Serve hot as a side or with rice.
